name: Ricetta: zuppa di fagioli alla menta
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Minty Bean Soup.

value.name: Fagioli glabri
value.desc: A common legume in Teyvat with a light aroma. It can be prepared in a variety of ways, and is thus widely accepted by people all over the world.

value.name: Menta
value.desc: Un ingrediente rinfrescante che pu√≤ mitigare la piccantezza di molti piatti.

value.name: Zuppa di fagioli alla menta
value.desc: A rich soup made with simple ingredients. Mints and beans were boiled and ground together to get a smooth texture. The soup was then left on low heat till it thickened. Finally, some beans and mints were sprinkled on the top. This refreshing delicacy tastes equally good whether served hot or cold.

value.text: Purchase from Lambad in Lambad's Tavern
